bind

public void bind(java.lang.String term,
                 MediaServiceHolder msh)
Add a Terminal to MediaService entry. This notes that the given terminal is currently bound to the MediaService Creation date: (2000-03-08 12:42:45)
Parameters:
term - The terminal the MediaService is assigned to.
msh - The pseudo media service which is allocated to the terminal.

findForService

public javax.telephony.media.MediaService findForService(java.lang.String serviceName)
Find the first MediaService that is registered for a service name. Creation date: (2000-03-08 12:42:45)
Parameters:
serviceName - The serviceName the service is currently in limbo waiting to serve.
Returns:
A MediaService, or null if none registered.

findForTerminal

public MediaServiceHolder findForTerminal(java.lang.String term)
Find the MediaService that is registered for this terminal. This involves looking for a WeakReference for the MediaService bound to the terminal and dereferencing it. Creation date: (2000-03-08 12:42:45)
Parameters:
term - The name of a terminal we want to find the MediaService for
Returns:
A MediaService connected to the named terminal

register

public void register(java.lang.String serviceName,
                     javax.telephony.media.MediaService ms)
Assign a MediaService to a serviceName. Calls that are directed to that service name will be bound the a waiting media service waiting. Note that the service is the key in the table, since more than one service can be bound to the same service name. MediaServices should implement "equals()" and "hashCode()" correctly. Creation date: (2000-03-08 12:42:45)
Parameters:
serviceName - The name that the MediaService is registered against.
ms - The media service which is registered.

release

public boolean release(java.lang.String term)
Unassign a Terminal to MediaService entry Creation date: (2000-03-08 12:42:45)
Parameters:
term - The terminal the MediaService is no longer assigned to.
Returns:
true if the terminal had the MediaService assigned to it.

unRegister

public javax.telephony.media.MediaService unRegister(java.lang.String serviceName)
Find the first MediaService registered to a serviceName, remove it and return it. Calls that are directed to that service name will be bound the a waiting media service waiting. Note that the service is the key in the table, since more than one service can be bound to the same service name. MediaServices should implement "equals()" and "hashCode()" correctly. Creation date: (2000-03-08 12:42:45)
Parameters:
serviceName - The service name to find a MediaService for.
Returns:
The unregistered MediaService, or null if none found.

waitForMediaService

public javax.telephony.media.MediaService waitForMediaService(net.sourceforge.gjtapi.media.GenericMediaGroup group,
                                                              java.lang.String serviceName,
                                                              int timeout)
                                                       throws javax.telephony.media.NoServiceReadyException
Register a MediaGroup to wait "timeout" milliseconds for a MediaService to be registered for a serviceName. Creation date: (2000-03-30 10:10:48)
Parameters:
group - net.sourceforge.gjtapi.media.GenericMediaGroup
serviceName - The service name the MediaService is registered under
timeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for a MediaService to take over.
Returns:
The MediaService that is available to take over processing of the call
